plurals.item: 参加了 %s 场 swiss 锦标赛

string.name: rankedInSwissTournament
string.comment:
rankedInSwissTournament
%1$s is the numerical rank, e.g. #2 if you came second.
%2$s is the name of the tournament e.g. Carlsen Arena

resources.string: 在 %2$s 中获得第 #%1$s 名
